bike.description: S-Works FACT 11r carbon, FACT IS construction, compact race design

components.description: S-Works FACT monocoque carbon fork; full carbon legs, crown and steerer, 1.5" crown bearing race
S-Works Mindset, 1 1/8" integrated threadless, sealed cartridge ceramic bearings w/ stainless steel races, carbon 20mm cone w/ one 10mm and two 5mm carbon spacers
S-Works SL, FACT carbon w/ Zertz insert, 27.2mm
S-Works FACT carbon crankset, integrated oversize design
Carbon chain stay protector, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual
